query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.CS136_GYM ,'' CS136_GND ,'' CS136_ARA ,'' PST ,A.CS136_UPN ,A.CS136_CST ,A.CS136_BSU ,(SELECT B.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 B WHERE MM005A.MANDT = A.MANDT AND MM005A.LGORT = A.CS136_BSU AND MM005A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND MM005A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR ) BSU_NM ,A.CS136_PJT ,A.CS136_PST ,( SELECT BC.CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111,SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 BC WHERE CS111.MANDT = A.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = A.CS136_PJT AND CS111.MANDT = BC.MANDT AND CS111.BPM =CCSB1EMP ORDER BY CS111.HNO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) BOSU_PM ,SUM(VALUE(A.CS136_BAM,0)+VALUE(A.CS136_IY1,0)+VALUE(A.CS136_IY2,0)+VALUE(A.CS136_IY3,0)+VALUE(A.CS136_IY4,0)) GISUNGBI ,CASE WHEN A.CS136_PST > '' OR A.CS136_PST IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'CS117' AND CODE2 = A.CS136_PST) ELSE '' END PST_NM ,'' CS136_MBS ,'' GBN FROM ( SELECT CS136.MANDT ,CS136.CS136_GYM ,CS136.CS136_UPN ,CS136.CS136_CST ,CS136.CS136_BSU ,CS136.CS136_PJT ,CS136.CS136_PST ,CS136.CS136_BAM ,CS136.CS136_IY1 ,CS136.CS136_IY2 ,CS136.CS136_IY3 ,CS136.CS136_IY4 FROM ( SELECT CS131.MANDT ,CS131.CS131_UPN ,CS131.CS131_CST ,CS131.CS131_PJT ,CS131.CS131_HNO ,CS131.CS131_SEQ ,CS131.CS131_GND ,CS131.CS131_MYM ,MAX(CS131.CS131_ISR) CS131_ISR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136 ,SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131 WHERE CS136.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND CS136.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136.CS136_BSU = #LIFNR# AND CS136.CS136_GND = #GND# AND CS136.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136.CS136_MBS = ''
AND CS136.CS136_PST IN ('A5','A6')
AND CS131.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND CS131.CS131_UPN = CS136.CS136_UPN AND CS131.CS131_CST = CS136.CS136_CST AND CS131.CS131_PJT = CS136.CS136_PJT AND CS131.CS131_HNO = CS136.CS136_HNO AND CS131.CS131_SEQ = CS136.CS136_SEQ AND CS131.CS131_GND = CS136.CS136_GND AND CS131.CS131_MYM = CS136.CS136_JYM GROUP BY CS131.MANDT,CS131.CS131_UPN,CS131.CS131_CST,CS131.CS131_PJT, CS131.CS131_HNO,CS131.CS131_SEQ,CS131.CS131_GND,CS131.CS131_MYM ) CS131A ,SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131B ,SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136 WHERE CS131A.MANDT = CS131B.MANDT AND CS131A.CS131_UPN = CS131B.CS131_UPN AND CS131A.CS131_CST = CS131B.CS131_CST AND CS131A.CS131_PJT = CS131B.CS131_PJT AND CS131A.CS131_HNO = CS131B.CS131_HNO AND CS131A.CS131_SEQ = CS131B.CS131_SEQ AND CS131A.CS131_GND = CS131B.CS131_GND AND CS131A.CS131_MYM = CS131B.CS131_MYM AND CS131A.CS131_ISR = CS131B.CS131_ISR AND CS131B.CS131_MYB = '' AND CS131B.VBELN > '' AND CS131B.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND CS131B.CS131_UPN = CS136.CS136_UPN AND CS131B.CS131_CST = CS136.CS136_CST AND CS131B.CS131_PJT = CS136.CS136_PJT AND CS131B.CS131_HNO = CS136.CS136_HNO AND CS131B.CS131_SEQ = CS136.CS136_SEQ AND CS131B.CS131_GND = CS136.CS136_GND AND CS131B.CS131_MYM = CS136.CS136_JYM ) A GROUP BY A.MANDT,A.CS136_GYM,A.CS136_UPN,A.CS136_CST,A.CS136_PJT,A.CS136_PST,A.CS136_BSU
UNION
SELECT CS136.MANDT ,CS136.CS136_GYM ,'' CS136_GND ,'' CS136_ARA ,'' PST ,CS136.CS136_UPN ,CS136.CS136_CST ,CS136.CS136_BSU ,(SELECT B.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 B WHERE MM005A.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND MM005A.LGORT = CS136.CS136_BSU AND MM005A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND MM005A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR ) BSU_NM ,CS136.CS136_PJT ,CS136.CS136_PST ,( SELECT BC.CCSB1EPN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111,SAPHEE.ZTBCSB1 BC WHERE CS111.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = CS136.CS136_PJT AND CS111.MANDT = BC.MANDT AND CS111.BPM =CCSB1EMP FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) BOSU_PM ,SUM(VALUE(CS136.CS136_BAM,0)+VALUE(CS136.CS136_IY1,0)+VALUE(CS136.CS136_IY2,0)+VALUE(CS136.CS136_IY3,0)+VALUE(CS136.CS136_IY4,0)) GISUNGBI ,CASE WHEN CS136.CS136_PST > '' OR CS136.CS136_PST IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'CS117' AND CODE2 = CS136.CS136_PST) ELSE '' END PST_NM ,'매출미발생' CS136_MBS ,'' GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136 WHERE CS136.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND CS136.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136.CS136_BSU = #LIFNR# AND CS136.CS136_GND = #GND#
AND CS136.CS136_PST IN ('A5','A6')
AND CS136.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136.CS136_MBS = 'Y' GROUP BY CS136.MANDT,CS136.CS136_GYM,CS136.CS136_UPN,CS136.CS136_CST,CS136.CS136_PJT,CS136.CS136_PST,CS136.CS136_BSU
WITH UR
